front.title: Requirements Analysis for OPC UA over CoAP

abstract.t: Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) is a application protocol proposed for constrained nodes and constrained networks. Applying CoAP protocol in the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) is a very attractive scenarios. OPC Unified Architecture (OPC UA) defines a semantic-based information model and a service-oriented architecture for industrial control system that can satisfy the requirements of Industry 4.0, which is based on semantic information exchange. This document analyses requirements for transmitting OPC UA over CoAP.
